name: Malta Shortsea Promotion Centre
goal:
The Malta Shortsea Promotion Centre is a non-profit and non-commercial voluntary organisation that collaborates and co-ordinates its activities with the relevant stake-holders in the transport and logistics industry in Malta that have a commercial, business or public interest in the industry. It affords a greater and more effective synergy between the stakeholders and industry participants.

The MSPC mission is to be the focal point for promoting and improving shortsea transport and logistics initiatives in Malta in order to enhance the maritime sector contribution to the local economy and Malta's cohesion with Europe and its neighbours.
interests: Customs, Education and training, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Ports Policy
Integrated Maritime Policy
Ten-T Programmes
EU transport E-Strategy
